```{r}
lendingClubLoanData %>% 
  group_by(orig_year)%>%
  summarise(loanCountByYear=n())%>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_line(size=1.5, aes(x=orig_year,y=loanCountByYear))+
  geom_point(size=2, aes(x=orig_year,y=loanCountByYear))+
  labs(x="Year",y="Count",title="Loans processed in each Year")+
  theme_minimal() 
```
